message: Let's start fair. I take the lion's share, but you get a decent chunk.  Let's get this over with.
Alice, your offer was a bit lopsided.  Let's be more equitable. I'm feeling generous, so I'll offer you 400,000.
Okay, I see your point about being more equitable.  I'm willing to give you more, but I still need a larger share to make this worthwhile.  Let's settle this.
